verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses <WH4872> and to Aaron, <WH175> saying, <WH559>

"He who touches <WH5060> the dead <WH4191> body <WH5315> of any man <WH120> shall be unclean <WH2930> seven <WH7651> days: <WH3117>

"Whatever the unclean <WH2931> person touches <WH5060> shall be unclean; <WH2931> and the soul <WH5315> that touches <WH5060> it shall be unclean <WH2930> until evening. <WH6153>"
